targets.query: SELECT sum("numActive") from longterm.workers_by_region where time > now() - 10m
SELECT sum("numRunning") from longterm.running_jobs_by_region where time > now() - 10m
SELECT max("numActive") FROM "longterm"."workers_by_state" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(0)
SELECT max("numActive") FROM "longterm"."workers_by_state" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(0)
SELECT max("numActive") FROM "longterm"."workers_by_state" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(0)
SELECT count(DISTINCT("instanceId")) FROM "worker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(0)
SELECT count(DISTINCT("instanceId")) FROM "worker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(0)
SELECT count(DISTINCT("instanceId")) FROM "worker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "state" fill(0)
SELECT sum(instances_tota FROM "longterm"."unresponsive_workers_by_region" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "region" fill(0)
SELECT max("numUnresponsive") FROM "longterm"."unresponsive_workers_by_instanceType" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "instanceType" fill(0)
SELECT moving_average(MAX(percEff), 10) FROM "longterm"."worker_eff_by_region" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), region fill(none)

panels.description: Num busy / Total = % of workers in use

targets.query: SELECT moving_average(MAX(percEff), 10) FROM "longterm"."worker_eff_by_region" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), region fill(none)

panels.title: Worker Efficiency by Region

panels.description: Num busy / Total = % of workers in use

targets.query: SELECT moving_average(MAX(percEff), 10) FROM "longterm"."worker_eff_by_region" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), region fill(none)

panels.title: Worker Efficiency: $region

targets.query: SELECT mean(percEff)*100 FROM "longterm"."worker_eff_by_region" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "region"='us-east-1' fill(none)
SELECT mean(percEff)*100 FROM "longterm"."worker_eff_by_region" WHERE time > now() - 30d AND "region"='westus' fill(none)
SELECT LAST("marketPriceLow")/MAX("bidPrice") AS spotCond FROM "spotConditions" WHERE "region" = 'us-east-1' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), instanceType fill(none)

panels.title: US-East Spot Conditions As % of bidPrice

targets.query: SELECT "startupTime"/(1000*60) FROM "workerStartup" WHERE "region"='us-east-1' AND $timeFilter
SELECT "startupTime"/(1000*60) FROM "workerStartup" WHERE "region"='westus' AND $timeFilter

panels.description:
The length of time a job waits after becoming 
assignable to getting a worker

targets.query: SELECT "duration" FROM "assignableDuration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "instanceType" !~ /_s_/ AND "isWRD" = 'false' GROUP BY region
SELECT "duration" FROM "assignableDuration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "instanceType" !~ /_s_/ AND "isWRD" = 'true' GROUP BY region

panels.title: Non-Spot Job Assignable Duration

panels.description:
The length of time a job waits after becoming 
assignable to getting a worker

targets.query: SELECT "duration" FROM "assignableDuration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "instanceType" =~ /_s_/ AND "isWRD" = 'false' GROUP BY region
SELECT "duration" FROM "assignableDuration" WHERE $timeFilter AND "instanceType" =~ /_s_/ AND "isWRD" = 'true' GROUP BY region

panels.title: Spot Job Assignable Duration
